Articles.Content:
I saw a post where a kerbal has a blue helmet and is customized. I was wondering how to create custom kerbals and change the colors of the EVA suits.

Is there a mod for this?

This Is the image.
Not sure, but I think it is Texture Replacer or something like that.
Indeed it is Texture Replacer - though I'm not sure how you'd go about making your own skins with it

The mod is texture Replacer

Also you can go into the cfg to edit the kerbal's name and stats I suggest hiring a new kerbal then doing this before launching him/her the cfg ypur looking for is persistent.sfs

Message me if you want help with this.

Thats All

JT

Indeed it is Texture Replacer - though I'm not sure how you'd go about making your own skins with it

Yes it is Texture Replacer that will do it. It's pretty easy to edit the suits in photoshop or gimp, save them as .png's and simply put them in the proper folders so they will be configurable within TextureReplacer.

You fire up the game, TR has a nice window that lets you set specific suits for individual Kerbals or by role (scientist, pilot etc), even experience, and off you go. The next scientist you choose, for example, will come in his shiny new scientist suit.

Check my suits here. Download it if you like so you can see the file and folder structure required to achieve the above. Simply name your files the same and you're good! Good luck!
